alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 1:12AM CDT until June 24 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Rock County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Brown County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Holt County in north central Nebraska... Keya Paha County in north central Nebraska... Western Boyd County in north central Nebraska... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 111 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles east of Wewela to near Long Pine, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Bassett, Springview, Atkinson, Stuart, Butte, Long Pine, Newport, Naper, Dustin, Burton, Anoka, Nets Peak, ariaville and Pine Glen State Wildlife Refuge. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 173 and 225. Highway 20 between mile markers 234 and 293. Highway 281 near mile marker 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 34 and 120. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Boyd; Brown; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock
